biotools.summary: FLASHDeconv is an algorithm based on a simple transformation of mass spectra, which turns deconvolution into the search for constant patterns thus greatly accelerating the process. It is able to deconvulute MS1 and MS2 scans from top-down proteomics.

bioschemas.name: FLASHDeconv
